alert.note: Alert for Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 11 at 8:41PM CDT until May 18 at 10:01PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Grafton. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Saverton. Mississippi River at LaGrange. Mississippi River at Lock & Dam 21. Mississippi River at Quincy. Mississippi River at Winfield. Mississippi River at Canton. Mississippi River at Hannibal. Mississippi River at Louisiana. Mississippi River at Clarksville. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Saverton. * WHEN...Until late Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.5 feet, An access road to riverside raised homes on the riverward side of the Sny levee begins to flood near this level. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 19.2 feet and falling. - Bankfull stage is 16.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The river has been above flood stage since April 25. It crested near 20.9 feet on May 6. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon and continue falling to 15.9 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Mississippi River Saverton 16.0 19.2 18.6 18.1 17.6 17.0 16.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
